resources.string:
Changelog:

 	v8.2.0:
 		-Added a search function to trips list.

 	v8.1.4:
 		-Minor bug fixes.

 	v8.1.2:
 		-Minor Interface Optimizations For Android 4.0-4.3.

 	v8.1.0:
 		-Now the app supports Android 4.0 (Ice-cream Sandwich) and up.

 	v8.0.0:
 		-Now the app supports Android 4.2 (Jellybean) and up.

 	v7.6.0:
 		-Added a round icon.
 		-Removed Firebase RemoteConfigurations.
 		-Another attempt at fixing the startup crash bug.

 	v7.5.3:
 		-Added a progress dialog while loading trips from the database.
 		-Fixed a bug that cause the app to sometimes crash after a fresh install.

 	v7.5.0:
 		-The app now contains ads.
 		-Added the option to watch a video ad to remove ads for certain time.
 		-Added a progress dialog for signing in and signing up operations.
 		-Updated Crashlytics to 2.6.7.

 	v7.2.0:
 		-Minor bug fixes.
 		-Minor design changes.
 		-Implemented Firebase RemoteConfig to change the app theme.

 	v7.0.0:
 		-Moved to Firebase Database instead of SQLite.
 		-Fixed a bug that caused alarm to still go off when the user was signed out.
 		-Other minor bug fixes.

 	v6.2.0:
 		-Minor design changes.
 		-Added the option to sign in with a Facebook account.

 	v6.1.0:
 		-Redesigned splash screen.
 		-Redesigned app icon.

 	v6.0.0:
 		-Raised the required Google Play Services version to 10.2.0 again.
 		-Now using Firebase for authentication.
 		-Added the option to sign in with a Google account.

 	v5.0.0:
 		-Lowered the required Google Play Services version to 9.8.77.
 		-Fixed a major bug which caused the app to crash while trying to show alarm dialog on Android 6.0+.

 	v4.5.2:
 		-Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash instead of playing the alarm tone on Huawei devices.

 	v4.5.1:
 		-Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash if map history was opened while trips list is empty.

 	v4.5.0:
 		-Fixed a bug which caused alarms not to work if the user rebooted the device.

 	v4.1.1:
 		-Added a delay before showing the tooltip with AirView.
 		-Fixed a bug that caused the alarm to go off as soon as the user presses save if the trip time was older than current system time.

 	v4.0.0:
 		-Added alarm functionality.
 		-Added Crashlytics by fabric.io.

 	v3.5.1:
 		-Minor bug fixes.

 	v3.5.0:
 		-Added a map to show all trips.

 	v3.2.0:
 		-Added support for AirView on Samsung devices.

 	v3.1.0:
 		-Separated the duration from trip details.

 	v3.0.0:
 		-Added duration to trip details.
 		-Added Start Trip button.

 	v2.9.0:
 		-Redesigned App theme.
 		-Added Settings panel.

 	v2.5.0:
 		-Added Registration panel
 		-Passwords are now encrypted.

 	v2.1.0:
 		-Minor bug fixes.

 	v2.0.0:
 		-Integrated Database for storage.

 	v1.0.0:
 		-Initial release.
